definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="256" y="158"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="true" h="94.48114013671875" w="523.04931640625">Maximum damage the vanilla mace now deals is base 5.5 + 20% max entity hp. Weaker than the winged mace in damage, but this method does not require a jump.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.MACE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5.5</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">MAGIC</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_override_fall"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="height"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
